ygData.subject: Re: something i noticed w/Cha-Carillion
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Right, you missed the error message you cannot see your target . Once you went over the counter the song worked normally. This seems like such a boring
ygData.messageBody:
> > This also happened with the armor merchant in East
> > Freeport - he was indifferent even with Carillon
> > until i walked AROUND the his counter and stood in
> > front of him. Amiable.

Right, you missed the error message "you cannot see your target". Once you
went over the counter the song worked normally.

This seems like such a boring song, early discussion was that it was nerfed,
that it didn't help that much etc. But I find I KEEP it memed unless I am in
a high-demand dungeon situ (like Soulsek) where I need all my slots. Once I
"got" it, it very much changed my relationship to the world of Norrath, now
Halas and Highpass Hold are nnot so terribly hostile, and I worry less about
selling becuse I almost always get teh good price (not Rathe Mountains
however, haven't found a way to get above "indifferent" there)

Anyway, just a groggy morning thought,

Tszaaz E'Taurguin
